text: Michael Rensing (born 14 May 1984) is a German former footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He played for Bayern Munich, 1. FC Köln, Bayer Leverkusen and Fortuna Düsseldorf. ==Club career statistics== Club Season League Cup League Cup Continental Total League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich II 2001–02 Regionalliga Süd 2 0 — — — 2 0 2002–03 Regionalliga Süd 34 0 1 0 — — 35 0 2003–04 Regionalliga Süd 15 0 — — — 15 0 2004–05 Regionalliga Süd 18 0 4 0 — — 22 0 2005–06 Regionalliga Süd 22 0 — — — 22 0 2006–07 Regionalliga Süd 20 0 — — — 20 0 2009–10 3.
